messages.TRMSG_PRE_DOUBLE_BATTLE_1:
Teri: Yay! We’re gonna battle with
lots of Pokémon!
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_DEFEAT_1:
Teri: We tried really hard together,
but we lost anyway.
messages.TRMSG_POST_DOUBLE_BATTLE_1: Teri: Our mommy is a twin, too.
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_NOT_ENOUGH_POKEMON_1:
Teri: We want to battle with lots
of Pokémon.
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_REMATCH_1:
Teri: Yay! We’re gonna battle with
lots of Pokémon again!
messages.TRMSG_PRE_DOUBLE_BATTLE_2:
Tia: Yay!
We’re all going to battle!
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_DEFEAT_2:
Tia: We tried really hard together,
but we couldn’t win anyway.
messages.TRMSG_POST_DOUBLE_BATTLE_2:
Tia: When Mommy and Aunty and me
and Teri get together, it’s really confusing and fun!
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_NOT_ENOUGH_POKEMON_2:
Tia: Um, no.
We all want to battle together.
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_REMATCH_2:
Tia: Yay!
We’re all going to battle again!
